titles.title: Ensuring the Safety and Security of Iranian Dissidents in Iraq Act of 2015
Ensuring the Safety and Security of Iranian Dissidents in Iraq Act of 2015
A bill to require a report on actions to secure the safety and security of dissidents housed at Camp Liberty, Iraq.
Ensuring the Safety and Security of Iranian Dissidents in Iraq Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Corker with an amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 133.

bill.summary:
Ensuring the Safety and Security of Iranian Dissidents in Iraq Act of 2015
This bill directs the Department of State to submit an assessment to Congress of whether or not the government of Iraq is taking sufficient actions to ensure the safety and security of dissidents housed at Camp Liberty, Iraq.
